name: Task Manager: Save Your Device
description:
Description :)

You device is taken by the viruses now you have to fight against the viruses to save your device.

Rules in this Fight:
* You can only move one viruse at a time.
* You have to stop the viruses until the process get finished.

This is your fight for your device
